free_text.Learning outcomes: The students will be able to : [br/][li]Design the mechanisms of a microengineering  system that fulfill the given functions.  [br/][li]Dimension the components (standard or specific to the construction).[br/][li]Represent the concepts by using construction and detailed drawings. [br/]
free_text.Content: [br/][li]The most current [b]materials[/b] used in microengineering and their characteristics according to the functions to be filled, fabrication and treatments. [br/][li][b]Friction[/b] theory and applications.[br/][li][b]Guidance[/b]: General overview and principles. Technologies used and dimensioning methods.[br/][li]Permanent, temporary [b]couplings[/b] and with limited torque.[br/][li]Movement and torque [b]transmissions[/b] (friction, belt, gears, chain): General principles. Used technologies and dimensional methods.[br/]
